SID:Element.SID:Attributes:
<SID:Attribute id="value" atype="lpc_flt" acomment="For parent objects, the maximum fatigue used in the Marrach dueling system, normally 100 for a person, otherwise use 1 for objects.
For child objects, it is the multiplier of the parent's value, normally 1, or 1.1 for a final value of 110." areadonly="false" aquery="query_max_fatigue"/>
